title: lifebykokoro
description: lifebykokoro.com is a website and lifestyle brand that sells wellness products throughout the country marketing primarily through social media.
overview:
In order to increase sales of products typically sold in store, Surya Spa hired us to create a sales channel that would allow them to reach new customers. The result was lifebykokoro.com a website and brand that has allowed them to reach a broader audience.

Using our expertise in UX Design and Web Development we were able to quickly build a beautiful site and integrate with Surya's existing inventory backend. In addition we handled social media, branding, and advertising allowing Surya to expand its reach.
